attributes.action: Save the National NHS IT Project
attributes.additional_details: The Cabinet Office should reconsider their plans to scrap the National NHS IT Project. Over £4billion has been spent so far with the plan to spend up to the remaining £6billion on buy out clauses. Why not continue the project which will cost the same rather than just throwing money out the window. Let the public choose if we should scrap the project as its their £6billion going down the drain.
